lst.str: The Interministerial Committee on Credit and Savings, headed by Treasury Minister Giovanni Goria, said its decision reflected the "need to safeguard the principle of separation between banks and non-financial concerns."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Bank of Italy will request banks to insert rules in their statutes to ensure that companies or individuals holding five pct or more of the bank's capital are not given privileged treatment with regard to credit allocation and terms.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: These limits are set at 15 billion lire or two pct of the total assets of the parent company of the shareholding bank.
